instructions: With the screen on, press and hold the Power key. In the options menu that displays, press and hold Power off . 'Restart in Safe mode' prompt will display. Tap OK to restart in Safe Mode. Device will display 'Safe mode' at the bottom of the screen.

Drag down the notification bar and tap the Settings icon at the top-right. Tap General > Apps . (If using List view scroll to 'PHONE MANAGEMENT,' then tap Apps . If necessary, swipe right to the Downloaded screen. Tap the desired application. Tap Uninstall Tap OK.
With the screen on, press and hold the Power key. In the options menu that displays, tap Power off and restart . The device will restart and Safe mode overlay will no longer show on the screen.
